protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for prostaglandin E2 (PGE2). The activity of this receptor is mediated by G(s) proteins that stimulate adenylate cyclase. The subsequent raise in intracellular cAMP is responsible for the relaxing effect of this receptor on smooth muscle

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
